title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4043.5 - Disqualification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4043.5 - Disqualification

State Regulations
A horse, in respect to which there has been any
violation of the prohibitions contained in this Part or Part 4012 of this

Subchapter, or from which a sample has resulted in a positive test, may be
disqualified from the race and from any share of the purse in the race and such
share shall be redistributed among the remaining horses in the race entitled to
same. Nothing contained herein shall in any way affect the pari-mutuel
distribution which shall be deemed final and unappealable upon the declaring of
the race "official" by the judges at the conclusion of the
race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4043.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
